TopicTitle: Is scatter density bug crash solved?

Articles.Content: Hi, just wanted to know i NOW i can activate scatter density, because in previous versions, the game crashed when i approached some surfaces with that feature activated.Is this solved in 1.1?

Terrain scatter never crashed my game... nor have I heard that that is a thing that happens to other people.

You'll probably just have to try it out. Quicksaving before your landing attempts is recommended anyway
Id swear there were several people complaining about this some time ago...
